article.title: South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

Sioux Falls Office

South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center
Cinnamon King, Director
Augustana College - Madsen Center
2001 S. Summit Ave
Sioux Falls, SD 57197
Phone: 605-330-4265 | 605-330-4266 | Cell: 605-201-5045
Email:cinnamon.king@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
article.seometadatatitle: South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.seometadatadescription: Contact the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center.
